DestroyFVKeyOnStandby.title: FileVault Requires Password After Sleep
DestroyFVKeyOnStandby.description: Set to true to prevent storing the FileVault key across restarts.

dontAllowFDEDisable.title: Prevent Disabling FileVault
dontAllowFDEDisable.description: Set to true to prevent FileVault from being disabled.

dontAllowFDEEnable.title: Prevent Enabling FileVault
dontAllowFDEEnable.description: Set to true to prevent FileVault from being enabled.
